content.rendered:
A lightweight daily moisturiser that supports the skin’s lipid barrier function without clogging the pores or leaving an oily residue. Designed to balance the skin and control sebaceous production to maintain a clear complexion. Infused with bioactive native extracts of Kakadu Plum, Silky Oil Grass, Wild Rosella and antioxidants including CoEnzyme Q10 and Calendula extract to restore vitality whilst calming and soothing the skin and encouraging natural hydration.

Suitable for normal to combination skin types that require slight hydration and have occasional breakouts
in T-zone area.

excerpt.rendered:
• Balances the skin whilst offering hydration
  • Lightweight daily moisturiser that soothes and calms combination skin
  • Assists with reducing sebaceous activity
